CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper July 20, 1946, pg. 16, reads: "Footlighters - This is the name of the new interracial organization which is rehearsing 'Wuthering Heights' for fall presentation. The group is under the direction of Carl Christian, well known in little theatre groups in Pittsburgh. Shown above are scenes from the play... Right, Ralph Petti and Elizabeth Austin also have top roles in Bronte's immortal classic. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Actors from Footlighters drama group Elizabeth Austin and Ralph Petti performing scene in "Wuthering Heights," in interior with linoleum floor
